channel.title: The Two Worlds | REBORN | Server Hub | Minecraft | Runescape | Aion | Terraria
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r749/dillon_munien1/505xfqK_zpsf0054d7f.png[/img] [hr] [size=36pt][b]Updates[/b][/size]
Updated post with 718 gifs Started the unique skiller system Added npc for providing skillers with tasks Fixed the destroy option and fixed drop dupe
[hr] [size=36pt][b]The Development Team[/b][/size] [size=24pt][b][u]Runescape[/u][/b][/size] [center] [ul][li][b]Nolan - https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=484791 - Community Manager[/b][/li] [li][b]Dereck - http://www.rune-server.org/members/topher/ - Developer (317)[/b][/li] [li][b]Jeremy - Developer (317)[/b][/li] [li][b]Me (Dillon) - https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile[/b][/li] [li][b]Taylor - Developer (718) [/b][/li] [li][b]Sam - Administrator/Collaboration Person/Server Tester (718)[/b][/li] [li][b]Sam #2 - GFX Designer[/b][/li][/ul] [/center] [size=24pt][b][u]Minecraft[/u][/b][/size] [size=14pt][b][u]Work In Progress! - Will be updated daily[/u][/b][/size] [size=24pt][b][u]Terraria[/u][/b][/size] [size=14pt][b][u]Work In Progress! - Will be updated daily[/u][/b][/size] [size=24pt][b][u]Aion[/u][/b][/size] [size=14pt][b][u]Work In Progress! - Will be updated daily[/u][/b][/size] [hr] [size=36pt][b]We are back again![/b][/size] [size=2em][u][b]Background of our past[/b][/u][/size] You probably have never heard of us, but back in 2013 we ran a server hub called The Two Worlds, where we had a vision. A vision where multiple servers from different games were all joined into one large community. We kicked off hard and had around 30 players active everyday on our runescape server and around 20-30 on our minecraft server. Things were all running smoothly. The whole hub was run by me (Munien), Nolan (LanLan) and another person who decided to quit on us. The hub fell apart after the team split because of personal reasons and the minecraft server fell apart because of my personal issues aswell and not having enough time to maintain it. The runescape server fell apart after we ran into a cache error where everything just shut down on us, we tried replacing the cache but nothing would work. The server was lost because of one fatal mistake, and the backups wouldnt fix anything for some reason. Because of this error that i could not fix and the personal problems that made me unable to concentrate on the server i shut it down. [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,655166.0/topicseen.html]Link to old development post[/url] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=655505.0]Link to old beta testing post[/url] [url=http://www.planetminecraft.com/forums/thetwoworlds-development-team-needed-t339604.html]Link to old development post (Minecraft)[/url] [hr] [size=36pt][b]Our Vision[/b][/size] [size=20pt][b]Context[/b][/size] Our vision of the two worlds failed because of problems in our lives back in 2013. We are now back and stronger then ever with the development of two private server already underhead from our runescape team. The original vision was to have a whole community full of different games/servers all under one roof, and integrate them all together to give players a unique experience from every side of things. A game hub where players will given a range of games to choose from and different versions to play. Ranging from runescape 317-718 servers, minecraft pvp/factions servers, aion pvp/pvm servers and terraria pvm/pvp servers (of course this is only the beginning) [size=18pt][b]Features (Being updated)[/b][/size] [size=14pt][b]Types of servers[/b][/size] [size=12pt][b]Runescape[/b][/size] [b]-[/b] 317 Oldschool Server [b]-[/b] 317 Loading Higher Revisions Server [b]-[/b] 718 Server PVP Server [b]-[/b] 718 Skilling/Pvm ECO Server (With actual skilling eco) [size=12pt][b]Minecraft [/b][/size] [b]-[/b] Full server based on PVP [b]-[/b] Full server based on factions and team work [b]-[/b] Server based on minecraft minigames (hungergames etc) [b]-[/b] Server based on Tekkit [size=12pt][b]Terraria[/b] [/size] [b]-[/b] PVP Server [b]-[/b] PVM Server [size=12pt][b]Aion[/b][/size] [b]-[/b] PVP Server [b]-[/b] PVM Server [size=14pt][b]Highscores for each of our games[/b][/size] [size=12pt][b]Runescape[/b][/size] [b]-[/b] Levels [b]-[/b] Bosses Killed [b]-[/b] Exp [b]-[/b] Etc. [size=12pt][b]Minecraft [/b][/size] [b]-[/b] Currency Ingame [b]-[/b] Land Owned [b]-[/b] Amount of custom bosses killed [b]-[/b] Etc. [size=12pt][b]Terraria[/b] [/size] [b]-[/b] Monsters slain [b]-[/b] Amount mined [b]-[/b] Players killed [b]-[/b] Etc. [size=12pt][b]Aion[/b][/size] [b]-[/b] Amount of bosses slain [b]-[/b] Currency Ingame [b]-[/b] Rare Items Owned [b]-[/b] Quests Done [b]-[/b] Etc. [size=12pt]- Game - Game integration (Minecraft into runescape currency for example) - One large launcher to use for all of our servers - One website home to many servers/games - One large overall highscores page. - Custom content for each of our servers/games - (Will be updated as we go)[/size] [hr] [size=36pt][b]Media[/b][/size] [size=20pt][b]Runescape[/b][/size] [spoiler] [size=14pt][b]Multi Barrage[/b][/size] [img]http://s18.postimg.org/unr90aslz/Multi.gif[/img] [size=14pt][b]Dwarf Cannon[/b][/size] [img]http://s18.postimg.org/mfpbfb0pl/Dwarf.gif[/img] [size=14pt][b]Lava Flow Mine[/b][/size] [img]http://s18.postimg.org/3yuwohkrd/Lava_flow.gif[/img] [size=14pt][b]Poro Poro[/b][/size] [img]http://s18.postimg.org/lep2q6jq1/Poro_Poro.gif[/img] [size=14pt][b]Runespan[/b][/size] [img]http://s17.postimg.org/itckcdxq7/Runespan.gif[/img] [size=14pt][b]Cave Fish[/b][/size] [img]http://s17.postimg.org/tdhwh8cu7/Cave_Fish.gif[/img] [size=14pt][b]Rocktails[/b][/size] [img]http://s17.postimg.org/5nsgsjegv/Rocktails.gif[/img] [/spoiler] [size=20pt][b]Minecraft[/b][/size] [spoiler][/spoiler] [size=20pt][b]Aion[/b][/size] [spoiler][/spoiler] [size=20pt][b]Terraria[/b][/size] [spoiler][/spoiler] [size=20pt][b]Development of Non Server/Game Features[/b][/size] [size=14pt][b]Launcher[/b][/size] [spoiler][/spoiler] [size=14pt][b]Website[/b][/size] [spoiler][/spoiler] [size=14pt][b]Forums[/b][/size] [hr] [size=36pt][b]Support us[/b][/size] [img]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r749/dillon_munien1/0kQIzui_zps6b412697.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: The Two Worlds | REBORN | Server Hub | Minecraft | Runescape | Aion | Terraria
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Development team seems a little messy. Why are there 2 developers on the revision with the most documentation and 1 developer on the revision that’s the blind leading the blind? Surely it’d make more sense if you assigned the majority of your workforce to something that isn’t as well documented. Beyond that, is there any reason you have a developer solely for 718 work? If they’re even average programmers by RSPS standards (which is absolutely nothing) it won’t matter what revision they’re working on.

Best of luck regardless.

Read full topic

Oh man, we should talk…

Do you guys have a skype I can reach out to?

item.title: The Two Worlds | REBORN | Server Hub | Minecraft | Runescape | Aion | Terraria
item.dc:creator: @Munien Munien
item.description:
@Munien wrote:

[center]

[hr]

[size=36pt]Updates[/size]

Updated post with 718 gifs Started the unique skiller system Added npc for providing skillers with tasks Fixed the destroy option and fixed drop dupe

[hr]

[size=36pt]The Development Team[/size]

[size=24pt]Runescape[/size]

[center]
[ul][li]Nolan - https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=484791 - Community Manager[/li]
[li]Dereck - http://www.rune-server.org/members/topher/ - Developer (317)[/li]
[li]Jeremy - Developer (317)[/li]
[li]Me (Dillon) - https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile[/li]
[li]Taylor - Developer (718) [/li]
[li]Sam - Administrator/Collaboration Person/Server Tester (718)[/li]
[li]Sam #2 - GFX Designer[/li][/ul]
[/center]

[size=24pt]Minecraft[/size]

[size=14pt]Work In Progress! - Will be updated daily[/size]

[size=24pt]Terraria[/size]

[size=14pt]Work In Progress! - Will be updated daily[/size]

[size=24pt]Aion[/size]

[size=14pt]Work In Progress! - Will be updated daily[/size]

[hr]

[size=36pt]We are back again![/size]

[size=2em]Background of our past[/size]

You probably have never heard of us, but back in 2013 we ran a server hub called The Two Worlds, where we had a vision. A vision where multiple servers from different games were all joined into one large community. We kicked off hard and had around 30 players active everyday on our runescape server and around 20-30 on our minecraft server. Things were all running smoothly. The whole hub was run by me (Munien), Nolan (LanLan) and another person who decided to quit on us. The hub fell apart after the team split because of personal reasons and the minecraft server fell apart because of my personal issues aswell and not having enough time to maintain it. The runescape server fell apart after we ran into a cache error where everything just shut down on us, we tried replacing the cache but nothing would work. The server was lost because of one fatal mistake, and the backups wouldnt fix anything for some reason. Because of this error that i could not fix and the personal problems that made me unable to concentrate on the server i shut it down.

Link to old development post

Link to old beta testing post

Link to old development post (Minecraft)

[hr]

[size=36pt]Our Vision[/size]

[size=20pt]Context[/size]

Our vision of the two worlds failed because of problems in our lives back in 2013. We are now back and stronger then ever with the development of two private server already underhead from our runescape team. The original vision was to have a whole community full of different games/servers all under one roof, and integrate them all together to give players a unique experience from every side of things. A game hub where players will given a range of games to choose from and different versions to play. Ranging from runescape 317-718 servers, minecraft pvp/factions servers, aion pvp/pvm servers and terraria pvm/pvp servers (of course this is only the beginning)

[size=18pt]Features (Being updated)[/size]

[size=14pt]Types of servers[/size]

[size=12pt]Runescape[/size]
- 317 Oldschool Server
- 317 Loading Higher Revisions Server
- 718 Server PVP Server
- 718 Skilling/Pvm ECO Server (With actual skilling eco)

[size=12pt]Minecraft [/size]
- Full server based on PVP
- Full server based on factions and team work
- Server based on minecraft minigames (hungergames etc)
- Server based on Tekkit

[size=12pt]Terraria [/size]
- PVP Server
- PVM Server

[size=12pt]Aion[/size]
- PVP Server
- PVM Server

[size=14pt]Highscores for each of our games[/size]

[size=12pt]Runescape[/size]
- Levels
- Bosses Killed
- Exp
- Etc.

[size=12pt]Minecraft [/size]
- Currency Ingame
- Land Owned
- Amount of custom bosses killed
- Etc.

[size=12pt]Terraria [/size]
- Monsters slain
- Amount mined
- Players killed
- Etc.

[size=12pt]Aion[/size]
- Amount of bosses slain
- Currency Ingame
- Rare Items Owned
- Quests Done
- Etc.

[size=12pt]- Game - Game integration (Minecraft into runescape currency for example)

  • One large launcher to use for all of our servers
  • One website home to many servers/games
  • One large overall highscores page.
  • Custom content for each of our servers/games
  • (Will be updated as we go)[/size]

[hr]

[size=36pt]Media[/size]

[size=20pt]Runescape[/size]

[spoiler]
[size=14pt]Multi Barrage[/size]

[size=14pt]Dwarf Cannon[/size]

[size=14pt]Lava Flow Mine[/size]

[size=14pt]Poro Poro[/size]

[size=14pt]Runespan[/size]

[size=14pt]Cave Fish[/size]

[size=14pt]Rocktails[/size]

[/spoiler]

[size=20pt]Minecraft[/size]

[spoiler][/spoiler]

[size=20pt]Aion[/size]

[spoiler][/spoiler]

[size=20pt]Terraria[/size]

[spoiler][/spoiler]

[size=20pt]Development of Non Server/Game Features[/size]

[size=14pt]Launcher[/size]

[spoiler][/spoiler]

[size=14pt]Website[/size]

[spoiler][/spoiler]

[size=14pt]Forums[/size]

[hr]

[size=36pt]Support us[/size]

[/center]

Read full topic
